StringBuilderÂ¶

struct asmjit::StringBuilder
#include <string.h>

String builder.

String builder was designed to be able to build a string using append like operation to append numbers, other strings, or signle characters. It can allocate it’s own buffer or use a buffer created on the stack.

String builder contains method specific to AsmJit functionality, used for logging or HTML output.
